ValidationRule.description: When Lender does not plan to Underwrite a loan, they must specify the Request Type and Request Needed By prior to moving to Underwriting
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $User.No_Validation__c = False, ISPICKVAL(ffin_Lender_Plans_to_Underwrite__c, "No"), ISCHANGED(LLC_BI__Stage__c), ISPICKVAL(LLC_BI__Stage__c, "Credit Underwriting"), OR( ISBLANK(ffin_Request_Needed_By__c), ISBLANK(Text(ffin_Request_Needed_By__c))) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: When Lender does not plan to Underwrite a loan, they must specify the Request Type and Request Needed By prior to moving to Underwriting
